SA15bsa075_u:562: pratyakṣeṇāpi cakṣurdahanādikaṃ gṛhītvā bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante jātaṃ sthirataraṃ tadākāravijñānaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:564: astaṃ gataśca tadviṣayo 'vasthāntaraprāpto veti kathaṃ pramāṇopanītavastugocaratve 'pi saṃvādāśvāsaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:565: api ca yadā hālika eva havyāśanamanumāya bhāvanayā sphuṭayet,
SA15bsa075_u:568: abhedapakṣe na yogijñānaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇa bhinnamindriyajñānenaiva saṃgrahāt /
SA15bsa075_u:578: tāmantareṇāpi sākṣāt kriyālābhe ca bhāvanāvaiyarthyamiti kāraṇābhāvādeva sarvajñapratihatiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:580: yattāvat sarvapadārthasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ kimindriyajñānamityādi valgitaṃ tatra bhāvanābalajaṃ manovijñānameva sarvapadārthagrāhīti pañcama evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:585: tathā hi pratyakṣaśabdasya tāvadakṣāśritatvaṃ vyutpattinimittamarthasākṣātkāritvaṃ tu pravṛttinimittamiti pratipāditam / (#
SA15bsa075_u:587: na ca bhāvanābalāvalambino manovijñānasyānakṣāśritatve 'pyarthasākṣātkaraṇe kaścidasti śaktipratighātaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:588: yathā hi cakṣrurindriyaṃ svasāmarthyānatikrameṇa yogyadeśasthamarthamapekṣya svavijñānajanane pravartate,
SA15bsa075_u:589: tathā sarvāvidyāparipanthibhūtārthabhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamapi yogyadeśasthamarthaṃ prāpya svavijñānajanane pravartiṣyate /
SA15bsa075_u:595: tadavasthāyāṃ tu śrutinayanayoriva manaso 'pi kiyaddūreṇa viṣayasannidhivyavasthitika eva pramātuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:597: yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:598: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:599: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya /
SA15bsa075_u:605: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam /
SA15bsa075_u:607: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte /
SA15bsa075_u:609: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:621: yadi hi prathamata eva vyāptiḥ, vyabhicāro 'pi na dṛśyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:624: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa075_u:627: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī /
SA15bsa075_u:630: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:634: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane 'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:637: kāraṇābhāvo 'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:644: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti svārthamapi tāvad bhāvanā yuktimatī /
SA15bsa075_u:645: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye 'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante,
SA15bsa075_u:646: tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti svargāpavargalakṣaṇaparārthasiddhaye ca bhāvanā saphaleti /
SA15bsa075_u:647: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi /
SA15bsa075_u:648: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
SA15bsa075_u:651: tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye 'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam /
SA15bsa075_u:662: anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve 'vasite 'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi,
SA15bsa075_u:664: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:665: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve visaṃvādamupadarśyopasaṃhṛtam,
SA15bsa075_u:668: tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:670: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam /
SA15bsa075_u:672_1: 'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi visaṃvādasaṃbhava iti sthavīyasī bhrāntiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:679: na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ manaindriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:689: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:694: ato ghaṭāderapyālambanapratyayatvamaśakyāvagamamiti indriyapratyakṣamapi pratihataṃ syāditi / tathā, api (#
SA15bsa075_u:696: cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:707: ata eva kāminīpratibhāsasyāpramāṇatve 'pyapratyakṣatve 'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:720: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:722: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:723: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat,
SA15bsa075_u:725: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:729: na tāvatprathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ / jñānasya nirākāratānupapatteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:735: vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo 'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva sphuṭasyodayaḥ / tāvataiva sa (#
SA15bsa075_u:736: Nibandh 21#) viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti vyavahāraḥ kevalamarthādapyutpattau /
SA15bsa075_u:740: tadbhāvanaiva cārthabhāvanā, tatsphuṭībhāva eva bāhuasphuṭībhāvaḥ, prakārāntareṇa bāhyasparśāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:741: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:742: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam, tadapyasaṃgatam /
SA15bsa075_u:743: tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat,
SA15bsa075_u:745: nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena,
SA15bsa075_u:746: taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati,
SA15bsa075_u:748: na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma /
SA15bsa075_u:768_0: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt
SA15bsa075_u:768_1: sarvākāraparārthaparatayā sakalagocaracāriṇi cetasi ciravirūḍhotsāhasya tādṛgupāyaviśeṣādhigamo bhaviṣyati,
SA15bsa075_u:780: bhāvibhūtayostarhi yadi svarūpasya sphuraṇam, vartamānataiva syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:781: atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena /
SA15bsa075_u:786: yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śaradādikālayukta stathā tasya na bādhitatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:787: tatkālayuktastu na tena dṛṣṭa stathāpratītāvapi nāsti doṣaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:788: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:789: tathā kṣaṇikatvapakṣe 'pi ekatvādhyāropasāmarthyānna vyavahārikaṃ prati pramāṇasya kācit kṣatiriti śāstre prapañcitam /
SA15bsa075_u:790: yadapi kiñcedamapi vaktumucitamityādyārabhya bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve 'pi pratyakṣapūrvakatve 'pi vyabhicārābhidhānam,
SA15bsa075_u:795: yadi yogijñānasyārthādutpattiḥ, pramāṇapūrvakatvāpekṣayā na kiñcatprayojanamiti ceta /
SA15bsa075_u:796: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:797: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:803: sādhyatayaiva tādṝgdaśāviśeṣasya lokātikrāntātiśayasya paramapuruṣārtharūpasya sādhanaviśeṣapratipādanāya pṛthagjanasādhāraṇendriyajñānād bhedena nirdeśāt /
SA15bsa075_u:804: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā /
SA15bsa075_u:808: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so 'pīndriyajñānena janyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:809: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:812: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā spharata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:815: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham / tadevaṃ kāraṇānupalambhādapi na sarvajñatābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:816: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam, tathāpyastyevānumānaṃ bādhakam /
SA15bsa075_u:819: jñeyatvāt, prameyatvāt, sattvāt, puruṣatvāt, vaktṛtvāt, indriyādimattvādityādi /
SA15bsa075_u:823: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:826: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
SA15bsa075_u:828: kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā /
SA15bsa075_u:830: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā,
SA15bsa075_u:840: yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:841: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:842: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti /
SA15bsa075_u:844: sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt,
SA15bsa075_u:863: yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:865: tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve 'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti /
SA15bsa075_u:867: etenaidapi nirastam yadāha kāśikākāraḥ, samādhervyutthāyopadekṣyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:874: vikalpenaikasya kasyacidāmukhīkṛtvopadeśe 'pi nirvikalpena sarvamavabudhyamānasya vacanānāṃ sarvajñabhāṣitatvādeva //
SA15bsa075_u:891: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti //
SA15bsa075_u:892: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:898: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate 'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:899: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle 'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:903: tasmād yathā pūrvābhyāsato jhaṭiti prabodhitasyāriṇā prahārādidānenānurūpa eva prakramaḥ śastroddharaṇādikaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:908: yatpunaruktam piśācādikṛtaśaṅkayā nātrāśvāsaḥ satāṃ yukta iti / tadasaṅgatam, yataḥ
SA15bsa075_u:918: taccet krīḍanaśīlānāṃ rakṣasāṃ vā vaco bhavet /
SA15bsa075_u:927: tadviruddhaṃ ca rāgādiyogitvam, tatkāryaṃ ca vacanam /
SA15bsa075_u:928: tadetad vyāpakaviruddhakāryabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayati paramparayā viruddhatvāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:931: tathā hi vacanaviśeṣo rāgādikāryam, yo rāgeṇaiva janitaḥ, vacanamātraṃ vā /
SA15bsa075_u:938: tataśca viśiṣṭavyavahārasya sāṃkaryeṇa na tatraikāntena rāgānumānaṃ yujyate /
SA15bsa075_u:940: asaṃmukhībhūtarāgādayo 'pi hi svābhimatadevatāstutividhāne mātrādigurujanasaṃbhāṣaṇādau ca vacanamātramuccārayantaḥ samupalabhyante /
SA15bsa075_u:941: na ca yadyadabhāve bhavati tasya tatkāryatocyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:942: rāgādiyogyatā tarhi vacasaḥ kāraṇam, tayā vinopalakhaṇḍalādau vacanasyādarśanāditi cenna /
SA15bsa075_u:945: yadi kāraṇaguṇādisakalatadanyakāraṇabhāve 'pi rāgādi yogyatābhāvānnotpadyate vacanamiti sidhyettasyāḥ kāraṇatvam /
SA15bsa075_u:949: iṣṭatvānna kiñcid bādhitaṃ syāt, nāmni vivādābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:958: kāruṇikasyāpi niṣphalārambho na yukta iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:963: nanu nirvikalpasya bhagavataḥ kathaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ karuṇāsaṃbhavaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:965: tataśca kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kāryasaṃbhava iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:971: utpāde tu phalasya hetuniyamo no tu prabandhasthitau
SA15bsa075_u:976: nanu yadi nāmaivaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvena sahāviruddhaṃ dehendriyabuddhyādiyogitvaṃ tu viruddhameva /
SA15bsa075_u:980: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi naiṣāṃ kevalānāṃ sahakārimātrāṇāmātmābhiniveśalakṣaṇopādānakāraṇavikalānāṃ rāgādijanakatvamityagamakā eva dehādayaḥ sarvajñābhāvasya /
SA15bsa075_u:983: tathā hi yadyapi teṣāṃ sati prāmāṇye 'numāna evāntarbhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:987: na ca vaidikaṃ kiñcidvacanaṃ sarvanarāsarvajñatvapratipādaka mupalabhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:988: pratyuta nimittanāmni śākhāntare sphuṭatarameva sarvajñaḥ pratipāditaḥ / tathā hi
SA15bsa075_u:989: sa vetti viśvaṃ na ca tasya vettā
SA15bsa075_u:992: tathā hi smaryamāṇameva gavādivastu purovartigavayādisādṛśyopādhi gavādyupādhi vā sādṛśyamupamānena pratīyata iti sthitiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:993: na ca sarvajñasantānavartīni cetāṃsi kenacit sarvajñenānubhūtāni yataḥ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyeran,
SA15bsa075_u:1002: yato dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata iti adṛṣṭārthaṃparikalpanamarthāpattirucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1003: na cāsarvajñatvamantareṇa sarvanareṣu kaścidartho dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā nopapadyate yatastadarthāpattyā parikalpyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:1012: tathā hi yathā saṃsārasyānāditve pūrvapūrvavastusattāyā anavadhitvaṃ tathā sarvajñajñānasyāpi pūrvapūrvavastusattāvyāpakatvenānavadhiprasaratā iti /
SA15bsa075_u:1025: yacca na kiñcit tatkathaṃ prameyaṃ paricchindyāt,
SA15bsa075_u:1028: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā / tasyāpi vā kathaṃ pratipattiriti /
SA15bsa075_u:1029: nāpi vastvantaratāpakṣe jaḍarūpaḥ pramāṇābhāvaḥ saṃgacchate, tasya prameyaparicchedāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:1040: kiṃ ca, kaḥ punarayaṃ pramāṇābhāvo 'bhimato bhavatām /
SA15bsa075_u:1042: tatra svapramāṇagaṇanivṛttirvyabhicāriṇī, tasyāṃ satyāmapi vyavahitasyārthasyāna pahnavatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:1048: nanu tathāpi sadvyavahārārthaṃ sādhakamapyasya na vidyate /
SA15bsa075_u:1049: tathā hi sarvavido 'tīndriyatvāt na tāvadasmadādipratyakṣamasya sādhakam /

SA15bsa075_u:2246: yat punaratra nyāyabhūṣaṇoktaṃ na hyevaṃ bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:2247: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu,
SA15bsa075_u:2250: daṇḍasūtrayorhi puruṣasphaṭikapratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayo daṇḍisūtritva pratyayahetutvaṃ nāpalapyate /
SA15bsa075_u:2252: tad yadīdaṃ parikalpanīyaṃ tadā varaṃ pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
SA15bsa075_u:2265: yathā svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ, gotvaṃ sāmānyamiti vā /
SA15bsa075_u:2267: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitaṃ bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādagovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
SA15bsa075_u:2269: bādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmādyupādhicakrasya kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣaṃ dṛśyānupalambho vā prasiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2272: tatra na buddhyākārasya tattvataḥ saṃvṛtyā vā vidhiniṣedhau, svasaṃvedanapratyakṣagamyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2274: nāpi tattvato bāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau, tasya śābde pratyayepratibhāsanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2279: bahireva hi saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2280: etena yad dharmottaraḥ āropitasya bāhyatvasya vidhiniṣedhāvityalaukikamanāgamamatārkikīyaṃ kathayati,
SA15bsa075_u:2282: nanvavyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2284: apratibhāsāviśeṣe viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa kathaṃ niyataviṣayā pravṛttiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:2286: yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā,
SA15bsa075_u:2290: niyataviṣayā hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṃkaryaparyanuyogabhājaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2293: yenākāre bāhyasya bāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇābakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2294: kiṃ tarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva /
SA15bsa075_u:2296: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam /
SA15bsa075_u:2308: vācyaṃ svalakṣaṇamupādhirupādhiyogaḥ sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2310: tatra ādyantayorna samayaḥ phalaśaktihānermadhye 'pyupādhivirahāt tritayena yuktaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2311: tadevaṃ vācyāntarasyābhāvāt viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānaṃ vācakatvamadhyavasitabāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2320: yat sat tat kṣaṇikam / yathā ghaṭaḥ / santaśvāmī vivādāspadībhūtā padarthā iti /
SA15bsa075_u:2321: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayitum /
SA15bsa075_u:2324: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
SA15bsa075_u:2332: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ kadārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati tadeva vayamapi svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2333: kevalaṃ tadetadarthakriyākāritvaṃ sarvajanaprasiddhamāste tat khalvatra sattvaśabdenābhisandhāya sādhanatvenopāttam /
SA15bsa075_u:2334: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasiddhasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣikṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa bāsiddhisaṃbhāvanāpi //
SA15bsa075_u:2340: saṃbhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddheralaṃ sattvānumāneneti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:2345: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi ki tāmevārthakriyāṃ kuryāt, anyāṃ vā, na vā kāmapi kriyāmiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2346: nātra prathamaḥ pakṣo yuktaḥ, kṛtasya karaṇāyogāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2348: yadā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kārye śakto 'śakto vā /
SA15bsa075_u:2356: tadaikatra kārye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2358: yadā hi śaktasya padārthasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrotsāritamakaraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:2360: tasmād yad yadā yajjananavyavahārapātraṃ tattadā tat kuryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2362: tadevamekatra kārye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedād ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam //
SA15bsa075_u:2364: yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:2367_1: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ siddhatvādasiddhistāvadasaṃbhavinī /
SA15bsa075_u:2370: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet /
SA15bsa075_u:2373: tatra yatpāramārthikaṃ jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttam /
SA15bsa075_u:2374: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthitabījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvādaupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte saṃbhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa075_u:2377: tathā hīdaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ niyataviṣayatvena vyāptamiti sarvajanānubhavaprasiddham /
SA15bsa075_u:2380: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvasya sarvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2382: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddheranavadyo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2383: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kārya janayati /
SA15bsa075_u:2384: tato na jananavyavahārayogyaḥ, sarvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ prasaṅgaviparyayaniṣṭha iti nyāyāt //
SA15bsa075_u:2386: yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyam /
SA15bsa075_u:2388: na karoti caiṣā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamitivyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam //
SA15bsa075_u:2394: yat punaratroktam, yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2401: na cātra pakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitam,
SA15bsa075_u:2404: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2405: tat kathaṃ sattvādanyadanumānaṃ dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakaṃ nāstītyucyate /
SA15bsa075_u:2411: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādikamupanyasitumanalasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2412_0: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa khalvekatra dharmiṇi yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:2414_1: bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā sapakṣatāmāvahati ghaṭe sattvaheturupalabhyamāno na viruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2415: na cāyamanaikāntikaḥ, atraiva sādharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2420: tathā hi uktametad vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle 'tītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikārye 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisaṃbhave tadānīmeva tatkaraṇam /
SA15bsa075_u:2421: akaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2423: vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:2428: anvayarūpā ca kartṛdharmaḥ sādhanadharmavati dharmiṇi sādhyadharmasyāvaśyambhāvo yaḥ,
SA15bsa075_u:2432_0: tasmād yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe 'nvayaviṣayaḥ
SA15bsa075_u:2432_1: saṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi paścāt parigalati tato 'nvayaprasādhanārthaṃ na pṛthak
SA15bsa075_u:2432_3: vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścāt parigalatyeva /
SA15bsa075_u:2435: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2439: na hi kāraṇabuddhyā kārya gṛhyate, tasya bhāvitvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2442: na ca pūrvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātā asti, kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2446: tayā ca hetūphalāvasāyo vikalpa iti cet tadayuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:2455: tathā hi bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ bījādijñānāt tatkāryādaṅkurādervā niścetavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:2462: nanu kāryatvasattvayorbhinnavyāvṛttikatvāt sattāsiddhāvapi kāryatvasiddhau kā kṣatiriti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:2473: tadasiddhau pūrvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsiddho hetuḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2475: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvadajātasyānanvayaniruddhasya vā kāryārambhakatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:2476: na ca niṣpannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryāya vyāpāryeti /
SA15bsa075_u:2478: atha vā vikalpena yadupanīyate tat sarvamavastu /
SA15bsa075_u:2480: yadvā sarvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye viruddhatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2481: anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti //
SA15bsa075_u:2485: yattāvaduktaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na pratīyata iti, tat kiṃ sarvathaiva na pratīyate, kṣaṇabhaṅgapakṣe vā /
SA15bsa075_u:2487: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tatpratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
SA15bsa075_u:2489: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravarteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:2492: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā viruddhaṃ vaktumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:2495: tathā hi kāraṇagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva ityanvayaniścayo janyate /
SA15bsa075_u:2496_1: jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate / yadāhurguravaḥ -
SA15bsa075_u:2506: kiṃ tu yatra pramāṇapratītebījādau vastubhūte dharmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatra kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāya /
SA15bsa075_u:2513: nāpi kṣaṇikatve sāmarthyakṣatiḥ, yato viruddhatā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2516: avastuno vastuno vā svākārasya grāhyatvepi adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanād vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasya siddhiriti kva virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2517: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī na vastunī,
SA15bsa075_u:2536: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'saṃbhave 'pi sarvadeśakālavartinoratadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2538: sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt,
SA15bsa075_u:2553: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2558: na ca tṛtīyaḥ, prastutaikaviśeṣadarśane 'pi deśakālāntaravartināṃ viśeṣāṇāmadarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2561: sadṛśakāryakāritvāditi pratyāsattyā ekaviśeṣagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamatadrūpaparāvṛttamātre niścayaṃ janayadatadrūpaparāvṛttaviśeṣamātrasya vyavasthāpakam /
SA15bsa075_u:2562: yathaikasāmagrīpratibaddharūpamātragrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃṃ ghaṭe niścayaṃ janayad ghaṭagrāhakaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa075_u:2563: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyate, sarvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2565: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
SA15bsa075_u:2566: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekamakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatva sādhanasya viruddhatvaṃ syāditi na kaścidvirodha prabhedaprasaṅgaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2569: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭedṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyet tadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisiddheranaikāntikatvaṃ nasyāditi yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:2571: tathā hi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramikasahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryaṃ kariṣyati /
SA15bsa075_u:2574: svarūpaṃ ca sarvadāstītyanupakāriṇī sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:2575: satyapi svarūpeṇa kārakatve sāmarthyābhāvāt kathaṃ karotu /
SA15bsa075_u:2578: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2579: tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt, na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2582: tathāpi so 'pi tāvad bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa kārakaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2583: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvastādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurvāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2584: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvād bhinna evābhidhātuṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:2587: tasmād yadrūpamādāya svarūpeṇāpi janayatītyucyate tasya prāgapi bhāve kathamajaniḥ kadācit /
SA15bsa075_u:2588: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya vā prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:2589: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ kartā syād yuktametat /
SA15bsa075_u:2591: tataḥ sahakāryantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryaprasava iti kimatra viruddham /
SA15bsa075_u:2592: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti, sahakārisahitādeva tataḥ kāryotpattidarśanāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2596: yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu, ko niṣeddhā /
SA15bsa075_u:2597: militaireva tu tat kāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:2599: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā, naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2602: kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭād bhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
SA15bsa075_u:2603: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
SA15bsa075_u:2609: vyāptau tu sākṣāt paramparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2614: nanu yadi pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvadā janakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:2620: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvakālabhāvī,
SA15bsa075_u:2621: pūrvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī tadopalabdhameva jananamajananaṃ vā syāt /
SA15bsa075_u:2622: tathā ca sati siddhayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope siddhameva jananamajananaṃ vāsajyata iti /
SA15bsa075_u:2623: nanu kāryameva sahakāriṇamamekṣate, na tu kāryotpattihetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:2624: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ na sahakāryantaram,

SA15bsa075_u:3336: yataścakṣurindriyamapi rasādiparihāreṇa rūpa eva prakāśakatvena pratiniyataṃ tatkāryatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3338: na sattāmātreṇa cakṣū rūpaṃ prakāśayati, vyavahitasyāpi rūpopalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3339: tasmād rūpād yogyadeśasannihitāt tajjñānajananayogyatāmāsādya cakṣū rūpajñānamutpādayattatkāryamiti vyaktamavasīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3342: na hyanupakāryatvāviśeṣe cakṣū rūpasyaiva prakāśakam, na rasāderiti ghaṭāmupaiti niyamaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3343: ayameva tarhi niyamaḥ kuto yad rūpeṇaiva cakṣurūpakartavyam, na rasādineti /
SA15bsa075_u:3345: hanta tarhi yathopakāryatvaṃ prati niyamaścakṣuṣo rūpeṇa,
SA15bsa075_u:3346: tathā śabdānāmapi svābhāvika evāstu bahirarthapratyāyananiyama iti /
SA15bsa075_u:3348: na cakṣuṣaḥ svābhāviko rūpopakāryatāniyamaḥ, kasyacid vastunaḥ svābhāvikatvānupapatteḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3349: tathā hi svābhāvikatvaṃ vastudharmasyānujānānaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ - kiṃ svābhāvika iti svato bhavati,
SA15bsa075_u:3351: yadi svato bhavati, tadasaṅgatam, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3355: brūmaḥ - cakṣūḥ khalu svahetunā janyamānaṃ tādṛśameva janitam yadrūpopakartavyameva bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:3357: śabdānāmapi sa svabhāvaḥ svahetupratibaddho yenaite bāhyārthāvyabhicāriṇa iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3362: yathā cakṣuḥ svaheto rūpaprakāśakamutpannaṃ sat prakāśayatyeva rūpamasaṅketavido 'pi,
SA15bsa075_u:3363: na ca śabdāduccaritāt prāgapratītasamayasyāpi viśeṣāvagamaḥ samasti /
SA15bsa075_u:3365: atha svahetubhirevāyamīdṛśasteṣāṃ svabhāvo datto yena te saṃketaviśeṣasahāyā eva kamapyarthamavabodhayanti /
SA15bsa075_u:3369: na hi kṣityādyapekṣeṇa bījena svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvenotpannena rāsabhaḥ śakyo janayitum,
SA15bsa075_u:3374: yadā hi saṅketenāpuruṣārtha pratipādanamapi saṃbhāvyata eva,
SA15bsa075_u:3375: tadā na śakyamupakalpayituṃ kimayamabhimatasyaivārthasya dyotako na veti /
SA15bsa075_u:3376: tarhi vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bhaviṣyati / tathā cāha
SA15bsa075_u:3388: na hi viruddhasya sādharmyavati dharmiṇi sadbhāvo yuktaḥ, sādhyaviparyayasya tatrābhāvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3389: na ca vyāpakamantareṇa vyāpyasya saṃbhavaḥ, tatpracyutiprasaṅgāt //
SA15bsa075_u:3392: na ca tasmin pratibandhābhāvalakṣaṇo heturasti, svaviruddhena pratibandhena vyāptatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3393: na khalvayaṃ prādeśikaḥ pramāṇaśabdo jñāneṣu nirnibandhana eva,
SA15bsa075_u:3397: ataḥ pramāṇe dharmiṇi vipakṣe prāmāṇyasya viruddhavyāptasyopalambhena vipakṣe vyavacchedasiddhernānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3399: tasmānnirastāśeṣadoṣeṇa hetunā yat prasiddhaṃ tadupādeyameva satām (iti)
SA15bsa075_u:3401: evaṃ ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ pramāṇye niraste tadutthaṃ jñānamapyapramāṇameva /
SA15bsa075_u:3402: āptapraṇītasya punarvacanasyārthāvyabhicāre tajjanmano jñānasyāvyabhicārasaṃbhave 'pi na prāmāṇyamupagantuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa075_u:3404: yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitaṃ na tat tena rūpeṇa vyavahriyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3408: tathā hi paracittavṛttayo 'tīndriyatvānna pratyakṣasamadhigamyā iti kāyavāgvyavahārato 'numātavyāḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3409: tau ca kāyavāgvyavahārau buddhipūrvamanyathāpi kartuṃ śakyete /
SA15bsa075_u:3417: ato yadetasya prāmāṇyaprasiddhyarthaṃ vācaspatiprabhṛtīnāṃ valgitaṃ tadaprāptāvasarameva /
SA15bsa075_u:3418: evaṃ pratyayoditamapi bhaṭṭābhimataṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇyaṃ vyastamiti boddhavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:3419: tasmāt sthitametat na śābdaṃ bahirarthe pramāṇamastīti /
SA15bsa075_u:3421: mīmāṃsakoktaṃ tāvadupamānaṃ mānameva na bhavati, nirviṣayatvādasya / ihāpi prayogaḥ -
SA15bsa075_u:3422: yasya na viṣayavattvaṃ na tasya prāmāṇyam /
SA15bsa075_u:3426: tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3427: na sadṛśavastuvyatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate, pramāṇenāpratītatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3433: yadi sadṛśātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu dṛśyaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:3439: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇoghaṭata eva iti na sādṛśyamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:3443: tataśca sādṛśyasyāsiddherna tadviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3447: tathā hi prāmāṇyābhāve sādhye pramāṇyameva vipakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3449: tadayaṃ viruddhavyāptopalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamāno viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prāmāṇyābhāvalakṣaṇa eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3455: sa hi saṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
SA15bsa075_u:3457: na ca saṃbandhāntarāditi vaktavyam, tadapi kathaṃ teṣāmiti cintāyāmanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3458: na ca yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśāntaramantareṇa prakāśate tathā saṃbandho 'pi saṃbandhāntaramantareṇa saṃbaddho bhaviṣyatīti vaktumucitam /
SA15bsa075_u:3459: pramāṇasiddhe hi vasturūpe 'yamasya svabhāva iti varṇyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3462: tatka evaṃ jānātvayamasya svabhāva iti, yadvā nāstyevāyamiti /
SA15bsa075_u:3463: ayamanayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbaddhāvetāviti tu buddhiḥ svahetubalāt saṃbaddhavastudvayādapi saṃbhāvyamānā na saṃbandhamākṣeptuṃ prabhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:3465: athābhinnaḥ tadā saṃbandhināveva kevalāviati na samākhyāsaṃbandho nāma,
SA15bsa075_u:3468: bhede ca sa eva sambandhaḥ, nāmni paraṃ vivādaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3470_0: tadā yathā saṃbaddhapadārthasya svabhāvaḥ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇastathā tadapi rūpaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:3473: saṃbaddhaṃ svayameva cennanu yathā taṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:3474: pratyātmā jagatīmapi prati tathā tatkena yogo 'sya na /
SA15bsa075_u:3475: saṃbandhe parato 'pi tulyamakhilaṃ tenaiva cet saṃyamo
SA15bsa075_u:3476: hetuḥ kiṃ na niyāmakaḥ sa ca kathaṃ yogaḥ kvacinnāpare //
SA15bsa075_u:3478: tasmāt saṃbandhābhāvāt pūrvoktena nyāyena sārūpyābhāvāccāsiddhaṃ naiyāyikasyāpi nirviṣayamupamānaṃ pramāṇamato 'nantareṇaiva vyāpakānupalambhena nirākṛtam /
SA15bsa075_u:3480: yadetat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya parikalpanamarthāpattirityatra vicāryate /
SA15bsa075_u:3481: yasyārthasya darśanād yo 'rthaḥ parikalpyate tayoryadi pratibandho 'stitadārthāpattiranumānameva /
SA15bsa075_u:3483: tathā hi pramāṇaparidṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ kenacidvinā nopapadyata iti kuto labhyate,
SA15bsa075_u:3485: anyathā tena vinā nopapadyata ityahrīkādanyo na brūyāt, (#
SA15bsa075_u:3487: sa ca sambandhaḥ kvacit pūrvamavaśyaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kvacidadṛśyatve 'pi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādvā niścetavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3490: ekaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatrasthena vinā tatrasthaṃ nopapadyate,
SA15bsa075_u:3496: tasmāt paridṛśyamānaparikalpyamānayoḥ sati pratibandhe nārthāpattiḥ pramāṇāntaramiti /
SA15bsa075_u:3500: yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyamityādirveda nirākaraṇārtha yaḥ pūrvamupanyastaḥ sa evāsyā api prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3501: sāmānyenaivārthāpattau nirākṛtāyāṃ pratyakṣādipūrvakatvalakṣaṇastatprapañco nirasto bhavatyeveti tadarthaṃ na prabandho 'bhidhīyate,
SA15bsa075_u:3504: tathā abhāvapramāṇasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyate, tasyāpi nirviṣayatvāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3505: tataśca mīmāṃsakopavalgitopamānanirākaraṇārthamupanyasto yo viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo 'nupalambhaḥ sa evāsyāpi nirāsārthamupanyasitavyaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3507: tathā hi yadi ghaṭābhāvo vāstavaḥ prameyabhūto na syāt,
SA15bsa075_u:3508: tadā nāstīha ghaṭa iti pratyayaḥ kathamutpadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3510: nanu yadi kaivalyaṃ praveśasvarūpaṃ tattarhi saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe vidyata iti tatrāpi tasya pratyayasya sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3511: athātiriktaḥ, mukhāntareṇābhāva evābhyupagato bhavatīti cet, na /
SA15bsa075_u:3512: kaivalyaṃ tadviviktatvamasaṅkīrṇatvamityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pradeśasya ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya svahetuta utpannasya ghaṭapradeśādanya evātmābhidhīyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3513: sa eva cābhāvapratyayaṃ janayatīti kimapareṇābhāvena kartavyam /
SA15bsa075_u:3514: nanu ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya pradeśasyeti ghaṭābhāvayuktasya pradeśasyetyuktaṃ bhavatīti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3515: tarhi ghaṭābhāvo 'pi ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvaḥ kimabhāvāntareṇa svarūpeṇaiva vā /
SA15bsa075_u:3518_1: ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvo yukta iti kimakāṇḍamāhopuruṣikayā mithyāpralāpenābodhaviklavaṃ
SA15bsa075_u:3537: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiriti /
SA15bsa075_u:3552: tasmāt sthitametat, pramāṇasya sato 'traivāntarbhāvāt pramāṇe eva //
SA15bsa075_u:3560: tathā hi te 'gnimati pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyodarśanaṃ tadviyukte ca tathaivādarśanamityanvayavyatirekitvaṃ kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3561: nanu bhūyasāpi pravṛtte darśanādarśane ghaṭakulaṭādāvupalabdho vyabhicāra iti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3562: kimetāvatā tatrāpyanumānamastu, tadvadvā dhūmādāvapi bhā bhūt /
SA15bsa075_u:3566: tasmādagnidhūmayoravyabhicārasyāsaṃbhave śatamapi tadupapattayaḥ tatprasādhakaviśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhā vā nānumānopayoginaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3567: saṃbhave vā kiṃ tadutpattyā tadupayoginā viśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhena,
SA15bsa075_u:3569: tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyenacarameṇa cetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti //
SA15bsa075_u:3570: trilocanastvāha - pratyakṣānupalambhayorviśeṣaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ tābhyāṃ sāmānyayoḥ saṃbandhapratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3576: atha pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo dṛṣṭe bhede 'bhedamadhyavasyati, tadeva sāmānyam /
SA15bsa075_u:3580: vastu tu teṣāṃ parokṣameveti, kathaṃ tenāpi sambandhagrahaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3581: asmākaṃ tu bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati /
SA15bsa075_u:3583: tadvyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ saṃbandhamatikrāmediti hetovipakṣaśaṅkānivartakaṃ pramāṇamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptopādhivirahaheturanupalambhākhyaṃ pratyakṣameva /
SA15bsa075_u:3586: tathā hi dhumādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3589: vahnyādayastu yadārdrendhanasaṃbandhamanubhavanti tadā dhūmādibhiḥ saṃbadhyante / vahnyādīnāṃ (#
SA15bsa075_u:3590: Nibandh 107#) tu sphuṭamārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandho na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3594: na cādṛśyamāno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sagdihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam /
SA15bsa075_u:3596: iti tu dattāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
SA15bsa075_u:3606: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3608: anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet, sarvaṃ sarveṇa svabhāvataḥ saṃbadhyeta /
SA15bsa075_u:3610: athānyasya cedanyat kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati, anyatvāviśeṣāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3613: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi /
SA15bsa075_u:3614: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /
SA15bsa075_u:3616: kena punaḥ pramāṇenaiṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate /
SA15bsa075_u:3618: tathā hi abhijāatamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikāsaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3619: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandheṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇānyunnetavyāni /
SA15bsa075_u:3623: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāstatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeveti //
SA15bsa075_u:3626: na cāsāvanyo vā svata evāvinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhūyodarśanamātrataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa075_u:3634: kasya punarvyabhicāradarśanam yasya kasyacit śāstrakārasya, pratipatturvā /
SA15bsa075_u:3635: prathamapakṣe pratipattuḥ kimāyātaṃ yato nānumānamayaṃ kuryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3636: anyathānyasya tadviṣayapratyakṣīkāreṇaiva so 'pi kṛtārtha iti kimavaśyamanumānamanveṣate /
SA15bsa075_u:3639: śāstrakāraṃ ca pṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭasaṃbandho 'pi dhṛmādagnimanumāsyata ityalaukikam /
SA15bsa075_u:3641: na hi yatra vyabhicārastatraiva tāvati kāle deśe vāvaśyaṃ pratītimavatarati /
SA15bsa075_u:3646: tadaiva krameṇa vā vyabhicāraṃ paśyediti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3647: yadi tāvadasau kathañcit pravartate, pravṛtto 'pi vā sāmagryabhāvāvyabhicāraṃ na paśyet /
SA15bsa075_u:3649: vyaktaṃ tasya tāvat tadapyamānamāpannamiti mahat pāṇḍityam /
SA15bsa075_u:3653: tato bahulaṃ sahacāramātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vāvyabhicārī niścita iti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:3657: atha kadācit pratipattā pravṛtto vyabhicāraṃ paśyati /
SA15bsa075_u:3658: na tarhi yatra bhūyodarśanam, tatra niyatatvasthitiḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3661: yadyevaṃ dvicandrādau cakṣurādipratyakṣaṃ malinapauruṣamupalabdhamiti ghaṭādikamapi nopasthāpayediti cet /
SA15bsa075_u:3665: Nibandh 109#) tato bhinnalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣābhāsattve 'pi ghaṭajñānaṃ pratyakṣameva /
SA15bsa075_u:3666: na caivaṃ dhūmādau pārthivatvādau ca vyāptigrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya lakṣaṇabhedo yenaikatrāśvāsaḥ syāt //
SA15bsa075_u:3671: na cātra dhūmasyāgnisahacāraḥ sadātano 'yamatha suhṛddvayasyeva sātyayo gṛhīta iti saṃśaye sadātanasahacāraprasādhakapramāṇāntarasaṅgatirasti,
SA15bsa075_u:3673: tarhi bādhyamānatvābādhyamānatvalakṣaṇo lakṣaṇabhedo bhaviṣyatītyapi na vaktavyam,
SA15bsa075_u:3676: pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyālābho vā paryudāsaścāsiddha iti na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3678: niyatatvābhāve 'pi pārthivatvādau bhūyodarśanasaṃbhavāditi na bhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ //
SA15bsa075_u:3683: yadvi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tad grāhyam /
SA15bsa075_u:3688: tataśca sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣayā rūparasagandhasparśasamudāyātmakasya ghaṭasya rūpabhedamātragrahaṇe 'pi pratyakṣataḥ samudāyasiddhivyavasthā /
SA15bsa075_u:3694: na ca manasā tajjātīyānāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ śakyaḥ, manaso bahirasvātantryāt /
SA15bsa075_u:3696: na ca vahnivyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ āṃbandhamatikrāmediti vaktumucitam,
SA15bsa075_u:3698: yadapi vācaspatijalpitam, yo yatropādhinā niyatastatra tasya svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
SA15bsa075_u:3703: arthāntaraṃ ca kiñcid dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ ca kiñcit, na tu sarvameva dṛśyatāniyatam /
SA15bsa075_u:3704: tataśca dhūmasyāpi hutāśane syādupādhiḥ, na copalabhyate ityupādhimātrānupalabdhiranaikāntikī /
SA15bsa075_u:3710: vyabhicārasya sarvadeśakālayoḥ saṃbhave 'pi dṛśyatve 'pi sarvadā sarvatra sarveṇa sāmagryabhāvādapi niścetumaśakyatvāt /
